short_summary: The contract involves the provision of '''inscription and maintenance services for generator sets at the Sept-les Airport''''
description: This public contract involves the services of inspection and maintenance of generator sets for use in powering aeronautical equipment at the Sept-Iles Airport.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
======================

## E517-231038: Inspection and Maintenance of Generator Sets - Sept-Îles Airport

### Publication Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3830092267-Doc3831928585
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3830092267
* **Publication Date**: January 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 12, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: April 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Transport (TC) is issuing a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the service of inspection and maintenance of generator sets at the Sept-Îles Airport in Canada.

### Key Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Department of Transport (TC)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Sept-Îles, QC, Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

### Proposal Requirements

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 14:00 EST on April 12, 2023.
* Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Julien Ratte (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15155742?extsite=MTUxNTU3NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15155742?extsite=MTUxNTU3NDJfQU4wMTQ4
